tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SatelliteImageryData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_url VARCHAR(255),
    capture_date DATE,
    resolution FLOAT,
    cloud_coverage FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE SatelliteImages (
    image_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_name VARCHAR(255),
    image_type VARCHAR(50),
    image_resolution FLOAT,
    image_path VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE ImageAnalysisResults (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_id INT,
    analysis_date TIMESTAMP,
    analysis_type VARCHAR(50),
    analysis_result TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (image_id) REFERENCES SatelliteImages(image_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ImageTags (
    tag_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_id INT,
    tag_name VARCHAR(50),
    tag_confidence FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (image_id) REFERENCES SatelliteImages(image_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ImageVisualizations (
    visualization_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_id INT,
    visualization_type VARCHAR(50),
    visualization_data TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (image_id) REFERENCES SatelliteImages(image_id)
);

CREATE TABLE satellite_images (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    image_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    image_date DATE NOT NULL,
    image_resolution FLOAT NOT NULL,
    image_url TEXT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE satellite_metadata (
    metadata_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    image_id INT REFERENCES satellite_images(id),
    satellite_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    capture_date DATE NOT NULL,
    capture_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);
